00085    // Inline methods

00088    {  return true; }

00091    {  return false; }

00093    // Inline non-static methods
00094 
00095    /*
00096    * Write one object.
00097    */
00098    template <typename T>
00099    inline BinaryFileOArchive& BinaryFileOArchive::operator & (T& data)
00100    {   
00101       serialize(*this, data, version_); 
00102       return *this;
00103    }
00104 
00105    /*
00106    * Write one object.
00107    */
00108    template <typename T>
00109    inline BinaryFileOArchive& BinaryFileOArchive::operator << (T& data)
00110    {  
00111       serialize(*this, data, version_);
00112       return *this;
00113    }
00114 
00115    // Method templates
00116 
00117    /*
00118    * Bitwise pack a single object of type T.
00119    */
00120    template <typename T>
00121    inline void BinaryFileOArchive::pack(const T& data)
00122    {  ostreamPtr_->write( (char*)(&data), sizeof(T) ); }
00123 
00124    /*
00125    * Bitwise pack a C-array of objects of type T.
00126    */
00127    template <typename T>
00128    inline void BinaryFileOArchive::pack(const T* array, int n)
00129    {
00130       for (int i=0; i < n; ++i) {
00131          ostreamPtr_->write( (char*)(&array[i]), sizeof(T));
00132       }
00133    }
00134

00141    inline void serialize(BinaryFileOArchive& ar, bool& data, 
00142                          const unsigned int version)
00143    {  ar.pack(data); }
00144

00217    void serialize(BinaryFileOArchive& ar, std::complex<double>& data,

00220 
00224    template <>
00225    inline void serialize(BinaryFileOArchive& ar, std::string& data, 
00226                          const unsigned int version)
00227    {
00228       size_t size = data.size() + 1; // the +1 is for the NULL
00229       ar.pack(size);
00230       const char* temp = data.c_str();
00231       ar.pack(temp, size);
00232    }
00233

00242    {  ar.pack(data); } 
00243

00248    inline void serialize(BinaryFileOArchive& ar, IntVector& data,
